column1: Life table (period life table): Germany, period of years,

q(x) = Probability of death between ages x and x+1
p(x) = Probability of survival between ages x and x+1
l(x) = Number of survivors at exact age x
d(x) = Number of deaths between ages x and x+1
L(x) = Number of person-years lived between ages x and x+1
T(x) = Number of person-years remaining after exact age x
e(x) = Average life expectancy at exact age x (in years)
